name: LongActingReversibleContraceptiveLARCHCPCSDevices
title: Long Acting Reversible Contraceptive (LARC) HCPCS Devices
description: Long Acting Reversible Contraceptive (LARC) HCPCS Devices
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Family Planning - provision of long-acting reversible contraceptive methods),(Data Element Scope: Long-acting reversible contraceptive methods (i.e., contraceptive implants, intrauterine devices or systems)),(Inclusion Criteria: Long-acting reversible contraceptive methods (i.e., contraceptive implants, intrauterine devices or systems)),(Exclusion Criteria: Non-reversible (i.e., sterilization), moderately effective (i.e., injectables, oral pills, patch, ring, diaphragm), and less effective (i.e., male condom, female condom, withdrawal, sponge, fertility-awareness based methods))

concept.display: Levonorgestrel (contraceptive) implant system, including implants and supplies
Etonogestrel (contraceptive) implant system, including implant and supplies
Contraceptive intrauterine device (e.g., progestacert iud), including implants and supplies
